snippet.title: Lumini Console Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Lumini is a 2.5D sidescrolling action/adventure game, where you control a swarm of likable and very cute creatures called 'Lumini'. A long-forgotten species, a hostile planet and a journey of discovery – welcome to the world of Lumini... 
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/lumini-switch/
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/lumini/9nrv657360v3
Playstation 4: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP1245-CUSA16979_00
